snippet.title: [c64] Break Dance (1984)
snippet.description:
Clip from first (hot feet dance contest) of three possible events. Second event is variation of the first where you have to eliminate other dancers by duplicating their moves within a time limit. In third event you have to put dance steps in right order to win blasters. All events are really simple. There's also an option where you can program combinations of dance moves.

I like the crisp electro sounds even though it's not much of a song. After recording I played this event with pen & paper up to 2000 points and nothing was changing.

Publisher: Epyx

http://www.lemon64.com/games/details.php?ID=363
